ActivityStatus.name: Pipeline/identification
ActivityStatus.description: The activity is being scoped or planned

ActivityStatus.name: Implementation
ActivityStatus.description: The activity is currently being implemented

ActivityStatus.name: Finalisation
ActivityStatus.description: Physical activity is complete or the final disbursement has been made, but the activity remains open pending financial sign off or M&E

ActivityStatus.name: Closed
ActivityStatus.description: Physical activity is complete or the final disbursement has been made.

ActivityStatus.name: Suspended
ActivityStatus.description: The activity has been temporarily suspended
